description:
Sugane possesses the Inifinite Range NOTE power to manipulate time and space during battles. His G-suit draws influences from armored warriors, ninja, and mystical beasts with scales. He wields the "molecular-vibration tuning fork sword Shipuu" for dealing with enemies at close range, as well as concealed weapons and the "unlimited sword Arashi" for finishing moves against enemies at any range.
Source: ANN
name: Tachibana Sugane (G Suit)
